name: Reinterpretation of "Dream Caused by the Flight of a Bee around a Pomegranate a Second before Waking" #002
description: "Dream Caused by the Flight of a Bee around a Pomegranate a Second before Waking" oof, I lost my breath... That's one of the most famous paintings of Salvador Dali, which marks his return to his "paranoiac-critical method." In this reinterpretation, the art gains movements while the tigers now morph into pomegranates which become melting clocks later, two main elements in Dali's surrealism. I call this new computer modified art self-surrealism, as it uses self-supervised techniques in ML.
